bug.author: me97esn
bug.summary: Getting '¤¤¤' instead of float in AgentAction
bug.description: I ran the training, which looks succesful. I then try to run it using an internal brain. It works with some of the brains that I've tried, but not other times. Sometimes the trained brain responds some weird chars that isn't a number: ¤¤¤ Is this how it's supposed to be, or is this a bug? Using Unity 2017.2.0f3 on a Mac with osx version 10.11.6

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
